The food and service here is amazing.  We had gotten the red sangria, the ham/arugala/Brie/ balsamic glaze montadito, the grilled shrimp, chorizos, the mixed cheese / meat platter, meatballs, and the vegetarian chili.  This place gets busy so you might have to wait if you come during a busy time.  We came around 8pm, and waited around 10 mins, but the wait was well worth it.
